title: THE WOODS AT SHANNON LAKE ***Renovated*
posting_body: The Woods at Shannon Lake is a tranquil, wooded community located in the heart of Union City.
We offer spacious one bedroom floor plans with fully equipped kitchens, washer/dryer connection utility room, built in bookcases which compliments your cozy fireplace, and a relaxing sunroom.
You can also enjoy the sparkling pool, and health conscience fitness center.
Experience the Difference, Come see what The Woods at Shannon Lake has to offer!
The Woods at Shannon Lake is conveniently located near shopping plazas, daycares, colleges/universities with quick access to Interstates 85, 75, 285 and Hwy 138.
Union City is a quaint suburb of Atlanta just 20 minutes from downtown and Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport.
Union City falls into the Fulton County School System and offers K-12.
The Dixie Lakes, Valley Lakes, and many other small bodies of water reside in this charming town.
Grocery stores, car dealerships, banks, and casual restaurant chains are widespread in Union City.
Get outdoors with the whole family at Ronald Bridge’s Park, a hidden treasure that offers youth athletic programs, nature trails, ball courts, and more.
This strong community has many typical suburban amenities, but its rich history is just a plus.
The Historic Green Manor Restaurant is the picture of sophistication and traditional Southern cuisine.
After you find your apartment or home for rent, be sure to wine and dine at this historical gem.
Our caring and knowledgeable staff is available to assist you in finding your perfect home.
